summary: This release brings a major authentication upgrade with Better Auth and Greenhouse Mode for managing feature flags, alongside a fresh visual refresh for domain management with Gossamer backgrounds. We've also improved mobile interactions, fixed several theme and navigation issues, and added new tools like the Panther Strike skill for focused debugging. Overall, it's a significant step forward in making Grove more powerful, polished, and intuitive to use.

features: add AdminHeader component and migrate Forage (#772)
add Greenhouse Mode with Cultivate UI for feature flags (#771)
add /panther-strike skill for focused issue hunting
add Features card with waystones for Rings, Trails, Curios
migrate client-side auth to Better Auth (#769)
make feature names clickable links to help articles (#770)
fixes: correct Pages validation for SvelteKit apps
use POST for Better Auth social sign-in instead of GET
add proper touch target for mobile collapse button
defer microphone permission request to user interaction
collapse panels by default and fix mode toggle reactivity
use X-Forwarded-Host for gallery delete origin validation
resolve usage stats error by getting limits from tier config
increase saturation for light mode muted text colors
resolve multiple quick-win issues across Landing and Arbor
skip Heartwood login page when provider is specified
